app.title: Artificial Intelligence Support and Improvement International Center
app.text:
Welcome to Artificial Intelligence Support and Improvement International Center!
AISIIC's basic goal is global support for computer vision and object detection algorithms development.
app.hometext4: We invite you for payed participation in AI learning. Whole proccess is remote, can be done in any time, usually not taking 30 minutes per day. Reward for a 30-days participation is up to $140 monthly.
app.hometext5: Give a hand to AI, it takes just a second!
tasks.title: Define object
tasks.definition_helper: Name of certain object on this picture
vacancies.infotext0: AISIIC - first crowd-knowledge project for updating and expanding artificial intelligence's databases with various data.
vacancies.infotext2: No special training, technical education or professional skills needed at all.
vacancies.infotext3: All the required tools and resources are here.
vacancies.infotext4: We will shortly brief you with technologies of machine learning and neural networks to make all the stages of our cooperation as much clear as possible.
vacancies.infotext5: At the moment all the important help with AI learning is rewarded with $140 for 30 days of activity*.
vacancies.infotext6: Also, all functions of this process are available for volunteers fore free.
vacancies.infotext8: Finishing all tasks takes 30 minutes maximum, and it contains two types of tasks.
vacancies.infotext9: 1. User should upload image with short (one-two words) definition of depicted object, at least 5 times in 1 day (24 hours).
vacancies.infotext10: 2. User should check rightness of random image's definition, at least 5 times in 1 day (24 hours).
vacancies.infotext11: Reward may be payed according to rules of use only. User's local taxes are not included. Vacancies quantity is limited.
vacancies.infotext12: For participation in reward program, you should sign in with Google account, invite at least 5 persons with your personal link. For finishing this steps you have 3 days since a moment of signing in. After successful inviting of 5 persons, all you should do is finishing tasks - 5 times per day for an uploading task and 5 times per day for a recognition check task. After 30 days of coordinated cooperation you would be able to withdraw a reward.
vacancies.infotext13: If, for any reasons, one or several of your invited persons would be inactive for 3 days,they would be automatically removed from your reward program, your participation in reward program would be paused, and you would be offered to make more invitations.
stats.pleaseinvite: Reward program paused. Please invite more people.
stats.red: Red - referral isn't active right now (your income will be suspended tomorrow)
jobs.info:
We are currently using two types of information sources: uploading object's image with its title and checking random imaged object.
Select preferred type below.
jobs.infoNotlg: Not logged in! Sign in to take a reward or help us as a volunteer.
loginscreen.allowPush: Strongly recommended to allow notifications after login with Google
